mapper.sql: id, `code`, `name`, is_sys, remark, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_dict_type (id, `code`, `name`, is_sys, remark, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{item.id},#{item.code},#{item.name},#{item.isSys},#{item.remark},#{item.version},#{item.createBy},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateBy},#{item.updateTime},#{item.isDelete})

INSERT INTO sys_dict_type
id, `code`, `name`, is_sys, remark, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete,
#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{isSys}, #{remark}, #{version}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), `code` = values(`code`), `name` = values(`name`), is_sys = values(is_sys), remark = values(remark), version = values(version), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)

insert into sys_dict_type (id, `code`, `name`, is_sys, remark, version, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{item.id},#{item.code},#{item.name},#{item.isSys},#{item.remark},#{item.version},#{item.createBy},#{item.createTime},#{item.updateBy},#{item.updateTime},#{item.isDelete})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), `code` = values(`code`), `name` = values(`name`), is_sys = values(is_sys), remark = values(remark), version = values(version), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), is_delete = values(is_delete)
